name: Green Thumb (Vaughn Evans)
description:
"A bad simulation of a weird garden without a bunch of crap like a body or people dragging you down." -vaughn evans

Green Thumb is a simple gardening game aimed at reducing clicking and keeping strategy the focus. Touchscreen input, just hold your finger to till, plant water and collect your crops. And no annoying playable characters or anyone else to deal with. Who needs 'em!?! lol
